BESA.Kernel.Agent

Class MultiGuardIndexBESA

  • java.lang.Object
    • BESA.Kernel.Agent.MultiGuardIndexBESA
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProtocolStage

    public abstract class MultiGuardIndexBESA
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a subguard that executes itself if its field ack is equal to the event field in DataBESA.
    Since:
    JDK1.0

    • Constructor Detail

      • MultiGuardIndexBESA

        public MultiGuardIndexBESA(MultiGuardBESA multiGuardBESA)
        Creates a new instance of MultiGuardIndexBESA. In order to inherit guardIndex associates in the constructor, are due to call the constructor of the base class with multiGuardBESA and if wants to modify ack, it is due to do using the protected method setAck () and in this way mobility is not affected. By default, ack is the class name.
        Parameters:
        multiGuardBESA - MultiGuardBESA associated to this guard.

    • Method Detail

      • funcExecGuard

        public abstract void funcExecGuard(EventBESA event)
        This function is executed if the field ack is equal to the field ack of DataBESA.
        Parameters:
        event - Received event, contains the related data.
